UnitType.Quote: Do not attempt to hinder our movements or we will respond with lethal force.
UnitType.Backstory: Sellswords with a conscience or loathsome mercenaries driven by greed? Whether the Free Riders are acclaimed as heroes or despised as villains, an indisputable truth remains: they have the power to topple down fledgling kingdoms and empires foolish enough to cross them.

ImmuneToCold ImmuneToPoison Endurance1 Frostborn Spell_IcicleBurst Tough F_Female_Head_Mesh_01 Sovereign_Long_Hair Banshee_Skirt Banshee_Shirt Staff_HoarfrostConcubine Breastpiece_HoarfrostConcubine Greaves_HoarfrostConcubine Boots_HoarfrostConcubine GarroteCloak Let me wrap you into my cold, cold embrace and give you glacial ecstacy. These are Vertrar's frozen concubines, sent out to the four corners of Elemental on a mission to destroy Father Spring and his promise of renewal. Their task is to prolong Winter's icy grip and shroud the lands in a coat of freezing and eternal despair. UnitType.Backstory:
These shrills are said to be constructs made by Morrigan the Mad, in the laboratories of N'it'Vaganesh - his attempts to manufacture monsters to rival the giant spiders that the Titan Curgen kept at his beck and call. The water shrill derives its power from the Water Shard.
Their mandibles are potent magical reagents; practicing alchemists and wizards will pay top gildar for them.
